divs: Sighting Detailsthe object just sat there over the fountain river not to high i thought it was a plane at first but then noticed it was not moving just hanging there then it faded in and out a few times then just dissapeared into thin air as i was walking home near down town felt excited but not affraid i was looking up because people were still lightin off fireworks not a whole lot just one or two and i was walking from a very good view point of the city i was still on the hill when i noticed the object
Summary: the object was flat at top and flat on bottom with rounded sides
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Pueblo
There were no other sightings in Pueblo on or around July 4th 2010
